column5: Anyone been up to the maity? or the nine mile? if so how we looking for New Years Eve?? Is the nine mile froze? I sure as heck hope not!

If anyone can answer how the tribs will look 5 days from now accurately I hope they buy a lotto ticket and sign my name on it. LOL In my experience with those rivers you can't predict from one day to the next this time of year what you will find....
well.....thanks i guess! would love to know if they are frozen or not.....
